scripts.build: cd node_modules/@chassis && npm link @chassis/core && npm link @chassis/gulp && cd ../.. && build-webcomponent webcomponents/src/chassis-control webcomponents/dist --es5 && build-webcomponent webcomponents/src/chassis-select webcomponents/dist --es5 && build-webcomponent webcomponents/src/chassis-option webcomponents/dist --es5 && build-webcomponent webcomponents/src/chassis-optgroup webcomponents/dist --es5 && build-webcomponent webcomponents/src/chassis-select-title webcomponents/dist --es5 && build-webcomponent webcomponents/src/chassis-options webcomponents/dist --es5 && build-webcomponent webcomponents/src/chassis-optgroup-label webcomponents/dist --es5 && gulp build
